title: Where They Hid
subtle: Descriptive (fiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Have you ever played hide-and-seek? How do you pick a good hiding spot? Read Where They Hid to find out where a group of children hide. Use this book to teach students how to identify characters and setting as well as complete sentences. Detailed illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive sentence structure support early emergent readers.
reviewWords: above, behind, below, between, far, hid, inside, near, outside
comprehension: Story Elements                : Identify characters and setting in story
grammar: Complete Sentences                : Recognize and use complete sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word she
